CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 17, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Leech Farm Patients Stage 'Hobby Show' - Patients at Leech Farm Hospital staged their annual 'Hobby Show' of articles made by the patients while convalescing...In the bottom picture are Richard and Angie Kozell, Raymond Holmes, Frances Johnson, Rose Nelson, Miss Theodora Coates, occupational therapist and adviser, Mamie Jeffery and Viola Hunter. Displayed before them are floral and fabric art work. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Hospital patients and staff: Richard Kozell, Angie Kozell, Raymond Holmes, Frances Johnson, Rose Nelson, Theodora Coates, Mamie Jeffery, and Viola Hunter posed behind table with plants and textiles during "Hobby Show" at Leech Farm Hospital
